law.text: No action for trespass shall lie against the secretary for energy and environment, or any agent or employee of the Energy and Environment Cabinet, or any forest warden on account of lawful acts done in legal performance of their duties.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 154, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 4.
